Package com.ironhack.MidtermProject.controller.interfaces.users

Interface ThirdPartyControllerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ThirdPartyController
public interface ThirdPartyControllerInterface

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void creditTransaction​(java.lang.String hashedKey, ThirdPartyTransaction thirdPartyTransaction)
    Allows Third Party Users to credit amount in any type of account.
    void debitTransaction​(java.lang.String hashedKey, ThirdPartyTransaction thirdPartyTransaction)
    Allows Third Party Users to debit amount in any type of account.
    java.util.List<ThirdParty> findAll()
    Find all ThirdParty created.
    ThirdParty findById​(java.lang.Integer id)
    Find ThirdParty By id.
    ThirdParty loginThirdParty​(LoginAccount loginAccount)
    Allows third party users to login into their accounts.
    ThirdParty logoutThirdParty​(LoginAccount loginAccount)
    Allows third party users to logout from their accounts.

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      java.util.List<ThirdParty> findAll()
      Find all ThirdParty created.
      Returns:
      a list of third party users.

    • findById

      ThirdParty findById​(java.lang.Integer id)
      Find ThirdParty By id.
      Parameters:
      id - receives an integer id of user.
      Returns:
      a third party user corresponding to that id.

    • loginThirdParty

      ThirdParty loginThirdParty​(LoginAccount loginAccount)
      Allows third party users to login into their accounts.
      Parameters:
      loginAccount - receives a LoginAccount where the user enters their id and corresponding password.
      Returns:
      a third party logged in.

    • logoutThirdParty

      ThirdParty logoutThirdParty​(LoginAccount loginAccount)
      Allows third party users to logout from their accounts.
      Parameters:
      loginAccount - receives a LoginAccount where the user enters their id and corresponding password.
      Returns:
      a third party logged out.

    • debitTransaction

      void debitTransaction​(java.lang.String hashedKey, ThirdPartyTransaction thirdPartyTransaction)
      Allows Third Party Users to debit amount in any type of account.
      Parameters:
      hashedKey - receives the hashedKey unique that third party has.
      thirdPartyTransaction - receives ThirdPartyTransaction containing account id, account secretKey and amount to debit.

    • creditTransaction

      void creditTransaction​(java.lang.String hashedKey, ThirdPartyTransaction thirdPartyTransaction)
      Allows Third Party Users to credit amount in any type of account.
      Parameters:
      hashedKey - receives the hashedKey unique that third party has.
      thirdPartyTransaction - receives ThirdPartyTransaction containing account id, account secretKey and amount to credit.
